name: Easy Tinymce Editor Add Button
author: TrubinE

sections.installation:
1. Upload the Easy Tinymce Editor Add Button folder to the /wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->TinyMCE addButton screen to add buttons
sections.changelog:
1.2.0

  • Created and tested the first stable version
sections.description:
Simple plugin for adding buttons to the html wp panel of the tinymce editor.

Features:

  • Ease of use
  • Ability to add any content
  • Unlimited number of buttons
  • Support for strings / tags / shortcodes
  • Ability to add both paired and single shortcodes / tags
